summary: Elango and his friend Pulivetti come into possession of a time machine and they start profiting from it. However, their meddling with time prevents the death of a gangster, who begins to wreak havoc in their lives.
cast: Vishnu Vishal|Mia George|Karunakaran|V. Jayaprakash|P. Ravi Shankar|T.M. Karthik Srinivasan|Anupama Kumar|Bagavathi Perumal|Shivashankar|Jayabalan|Arya|Munishkanth|Thilak Rammohan
title: Indru Netru Naalai
